this is tidy tuesday

```{r}
#| label: loading-libraries
#| warning: false
#| output: false
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(ggthemes)
library(gt)
library(lubridate)
library(skimr)

```

This week's TidyTuesday is about timezones and daylight savings time.

```{r}
#| label: load-data
#| warning: false
#| output: false
# Get the Data

# Read in with tidytuesdayR package 
# This loads the readme and all the datasets for the week of interest

# Either ISO-8601 date or year/week works!

#tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2023-03-21')
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2023, week = 13)

transitions <- tuesdata$transitions
timezones <- tuesdata$timezones
timezone_countries <- tuesdata$timezone_countries
countries <- tuesdata$countries
```

Cleaning the data.

```{r}
library(skimr)
```

More

```{r}

transitions <- transitions %>%
  mutate(begin = as_datetime(begin), end = as_datetime(end))


```

Missingness

```{r}
skim(transitions)

```
